entry.source: I'd like help with finding weapons for Hunters.{F801}We need more {F804,5}firearms{F804,0} to deal with the{F801}rising number of demons here. There should be{F801}a JGSDF supply depot buried next to the giant{F801}wall {F804,5}north of Ikebukuro.{F804,0} The {F804,5}Jujo{F804,0}{F801}area in the Kita district has barely been{F801}explored, so you'll likely find something there.{F801}
